# Creatopy Public API

## Creatopy Public API

- [Public API](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/public-api)
- [Quickstart](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/public-api/quickstart)
- [Authentication](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/public-api/authentication)
- [Overview](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/overview): How to integrate into Creatopy using our REST API.
- [Auth](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/auth)
- [Exports](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/exports)
- [Creatives](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/exports/creatives)
- [Templates (Designs)](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/templates-designs)
- [Elements](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/templates-designs/elements)
- [Template Sizes](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/templates-designs/template-sizes)
- [Font variants](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/templates-designs/font-variants)
- [ShareLink](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/sharelink)
- [Projects](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/projects)
- [Project Users](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/projects/users)
- [Brand Kits](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/brand-kits)
- [Brand kit assets](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/brand-kits/brand-kit-assets)
- [Brand kit logos](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/brand-kits/brand-kit-logos)
- [Brand kit media folders](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/brand-kits/brand-kit-media-folders)
- [Brand templates](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/brand-kits/brand-templates)
- [Ad Networks](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/ad-networks)
- [Ad Serving](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/ad-serving): This page contains a documentation for each API related to Ad Serving
- [Users](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/users)
- [Team roles](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/users/team-roles)
- [Webhooks](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/webhooks)
- [Webhook action types](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/webhooks/webhook-action-types)
- [Design Versions](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/design-versions)
- [Folders](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/folders)
- [Move design to folder](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/folders/move-design-to-folder): This endpoint is used to move a design to a specific folder.
- [Error codes](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/error-codes)
- [Designs](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/rest-api/designs)
- [Overview](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/graphql-api/overview)
- [Endpoints and queries](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/graphql-api/endpoints-and-queries)
- [Postman Collection](https://docs.creatopy.com/creatopy-public-api/graphql-api/postman-collection)
